title: Projects

ğŸº Microbrewery Strategic & Quality Control Analysis


Designed a full launch strategy for a Houston microbrewery, integrating financial modeling, Monte Carlo simulations (1,000+ iterations), decision tree analysis, and linear programming to optimize capacity planning, reduce risk, and forecast a 15% ROI by year three.
Applied hypergeometric and negative hypergeometric methods to evaluate microchip defect rates in automated brewing systems.




ğŸŒŠ Cruise Industry Market Analysis


Performed segmentation and targeting analysis for luxury cruise offerings using Python.
Applied K-means clustering, conjoint analysis, and A/B testing to analyze customer preferences and optimize feature prioritization, directly supporting product positioning and marketing strategy.

Developed a research-backed Enterprise Analytics System (EAS) framework exploring how AI, machine learning, cloud systems, and blockchain enhance operational efficiency for SMEs and startups.
Presented actionable insights on scaling analytics capabilities, reducing process inefficiencies, and improving innovation readiness.




ğŸ¡ Airbnb Market Analysis â€“ Copenhagen


Prepared and analyzed Airbnb listing data using geospatial visualization, clustering, and regression modeling.
Built predictive pricing models (Adjusted RÂ² = 0.572), identified key price drivers, and segmented users using PCA, K-means, NaÃ¯ve Bayes, KNN, and Decision Trees to support pricing strategy and value perception improvement.




ğŸ›’ Northwind SQLâ€“Python Analytics Pipeline


Executed an end-to-end production-grade analytics workflow using SQL CTEs, window functions, and Python automation.
Ranked sales performance, forecasted seasonal demand, segmented high-value customers, and produced boardroom-ready visuals to support inventory and campaign planning.

title: About Me
text:
Iâ€™m Leo Hung Nguyen, a graduate student in Applied Business Analytics at Boston University, where I specialize in transforming complex data into clear, actionable insights for business leaders. My analytical approach combines technical depth with strong business intuition, shaped by hands-on experience across data analytics, digital marketing, financial modeling, and international project development.
I also serve as a Teaching Assistant for AD599: Python & SQL for Business Analytics, supporting more than 70 graduate students in mastering programming fundamentals, SQL querying, and analytical problem-solving. This role strengthens my technical foundation, communication skills, and ability to guide others through complex workflows.
Before pursuing analytics full-time, I directed market entry and digital strategy at Tin A Co., Ltd, managing cross-border campaigns across renewable energy, healthcare tech, and global trade. I also worked as a Data Analyst at Marriott Bonvoy Renaissance Riverside, developing automated financial reporting systems, improving data integrity, and contributing to revenue optimization initiatives. Earlier, at Thang Uy Group, I supported EV infrastructure analysis, investor engagement, and international expansion projects.
Today, my work focuses on blending machine learning, analytics engineering, cloud analytics, and business strategy to help organizations make smarter, data-driven decisions. Iâ€™m especially passionate about analytics applications in operations, pricing, customer segmentation, and technology-driven market expansion.


Professional Background
I bring cross-functional experience across:

Data analytics

Digital marketing

Financial modeling

International project development

Previously, I supported analytics at Marriott Bonvoy, directed marketing strategy at Tin A Co., Ltd, and coordinated EV infrastructure and investor relations at Thang Uy Group.


Interests & Focus

Data Analytics & Visualization

Machine Learning & Predictive Modeling

SQL & ETL Pipelines

Cloud & Big Data

Business Strategy & Entrepreneurship
